metadata.title: CVE-2024-42223 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:media: dvb-frontends: tda10048: Fix integer overflowstate->xtal_hz can be up to 16M, so it can overflow a 32 bit integerwhen multiplied by pll_mfactor.Create a new 64 bit variable to hold the calculations.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication.
linux-aws package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
linux-azure package in noble is affected and needs fixing.
